episode.title: If You Trust Your Twin
episode.rawTitle: 205: ‘If You Trust Your Twin’ With Jim Dalrymple
episode.author: Daring Fireball / John Gruber
episode.description: Jim Dalrymple returns to the show to talk about the iPhone X.
episode.showNotes:
Jim Dalrymple returns to the show to talk about the iPhone X, which is now in the hands of reviewers and just days away from the hands of customers.

  • Nicole Nguyen’s review for BuzzFeed.
